akn:content.akn:p:
§ 5355. Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated the following amounts for the following fiscal years to carry out the purposes of this subchapter:
For fiscal year:The amount authorized is:
1999 $5,000,000. 2000 $7,500,000. 2001 $10,000,000. 2002 $12,500,000. 2003 $15,000,000. 2004 $15,000,000. 2005 $15,000,000.
(Added Pub. L. 105–310, § 2(a), Oct. 30, 1998, 112 Stat. 2948; amended Pub. L. 108–458, title VI, § 6102(b), Dec. 17, 2004, 118 Stat. 3745.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2004—Pub. L. 108–458 in table inserted items specifying amounts authorized for fiscal years 2004 and 2005.
